    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Clothing
    The class Clothing, extended from Product, is a representation of Clothing in our online web strore
    CreditCardPayment
    Class that represents all the information of a credit card to use it when paying
    Discountable
    Discountable Interface, implemented by The Product class
    Electronics
    The class Electronics, Extended from Product, is a representation of all the electronics our store sells.
    Grocery
    The class Grocery, extended from Product, permits to represent food on our online store
    Main
    Main class, the one to execute
    MainMenu
    Main menu used in main to permit the user to do all the actions linked with the store
    OnlineStoreException
    Exception corresponding to our onlineStore class
    Order
    The class Order represents a list of product stocked as an order, it can be paid by credit card or with PayPal
    OrderHistory
    This class is representing the history of orders a person have done in our OnlineStore
    Payment
    Payment interface implementad by CrediCardPayment and PayPalPayment classes
    PayPalPayment
    Another way of paying an order: the PayPalPayment class
    Product
    Parent abstract class for the different types of products our store needs
    ProductReview
    Class meant to be a feedback class for the customer
    RecursionUtils
     
    SearchUtils
    The SearchUtils class is meant to be a toolbox of searching tools to find product available in our store
    ShoppingCart
    the class shopping cart represents a shopping cart that empties itself when an order is passed.
    SortUtils
    Class used to sort the items by price
